title: Liz Truss – 2016 Speech to Oxford Farming Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Liz Truss, the Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, to the Oxford Farming Conference on 6 January 2016.
content:
